title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 3.5 - Application to be accompanied by photograph and fingerprints
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 3.5 - Application to be accompanied by photograph and fingerprints

State Regulations

For the purpose of assisting the commission to ascertain the
character, integrity and identity of an applicant for a stevedore license, each
application shall be accompanied by a photograph and the authenticated
fingerprints on a record identification form to be furnished by the commission, of an individual applicant, each member of a partnership, each officer and each
director and each natural person holding, directly or indirectly, five percent
or more of any class of capital stock of a corporate
applicant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
3.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
